CHAT.comment: INV points to covered tank.
child helps INV remove cover from starfish.
mom and child go over to fish tank.
mom points to tank.
mom points to rock in tank.
child points inside tank.
mom lifts up lid of tank and child looks inside.
mom lifts up the tank light.
child is playing with light.
mom points to side of tank.
child is hugging fish tank and mouthing things to himself.
child points to rock.
child lifts up top of tank of and sticks hand inside water.
child takes hand out of tank.
child wipes his wet hands on his mom's pants.
child taps on glass.
child points to a rock.
mom points to rock she's referring to.
child points to his rock.
mom sticks her hand in tank and moves rock backwards.
mom and INV laugh.
INV covers starfish.
child starts to take cover off computer box.
INV and child remove cover from computer box.
child presses on middle sensor.
mom points to top sensor.
mom points to middle lights.
child puts mom's hand on middle sensor.
child tries to take computer box off table.
child points to different lights on computer box.
mom laughs.
child tries to lift computer box off table.
the bulletin board falls against the computer box and mom holds it back against the wall.
mom points to lights.
mom points to another area of lights.
mom taps on middle sensor.
mom taps on top sensor.
mom taps on middle sensor.
child taps on top and middle sensors.
mom taps on top and middle sensors.
child walks away from computer box.
child gets on chair and listens close to mirror.
child talks into microphone.
child talks into microphone.
mom takes child down from chair and back over to computer box.
child grabs mom's arm and changes places with her.
mom and child press sensors.
INV covers computer box.
child points to covered tank.
child starts to go under computer box cloth.
mom tries to pull child out but child hides in corner behind computer box cloth.
INV brings robodog into room.
child pulls back cloth.
mom and INV laugh.
child points finger at robodog.
child points finger at robodog.
child points finger at robodog.
child points finger at robodog.
mom points to robodog and plays with buttons.
child picks up robodog and moves it closer to himself.
child looks underneath dog.
mom starts to pick up dog.
child points at something on dog.
dog walks towards mom's leg.
mom and child laugh.
dog walks toward mom. She moves out of way and dog keeps going toward couch.
child puts hand down in front of dog's legs.
INV removes robodog from room.
INV brings car into room.
mom points to numbers on car.
mom points to back of car.
child lifts up fish tank cover and goes underneath it to look at tank.
mom guides child away from fish tank.
mom and child push car back and forth.
child puts car under computer box table.
child is doing something with car but his body is obstructing the camera view.
child makes sound effects for car as he drives it through his legs.
child drives car around mom.
mom puts leg up for child to drive car over it.
child drives car down mom's leg.
child and mom make sound effects for car.
mom makes stopping noises for car.
mom makes sound effects for car.
child crawls under mom's legs with car.
mom makes sound effects for car.
child pushes car under mom's legs.
mom puts her legs flat on the floor.
child pushes car under mom's legs repeatedly.
child hands car to mom and child puts his feet up.
child pushes car between his legs and car hits his legs.
mom makes sound effects for car.
mom drives car up child's leg.
child pushes car to INV.
INV removes car from room.
INV brings degu into room.
mom gasps.
child starts to peel off tape on top of cage.
child nods and puts his fingers on edge of cage.
child spins cage on table.
child puts fingers on top of cage.
mom talks for degu.
mom points into cage.
child taps his finger on top of cage.
child taps fingers on top of cage.
mom grabs child's fingers off cage.
child bangs on top of cage and mom shoos his hands away.
child lifts up side of cage and lets it fall onto table.
child picks up cage.
mom picks up piece of bedding that hit her arm and puts it back in cage.
INV removes degu from room.
child runs over to computer box corner.
INV brings meerkat into room.
child pushes meerkat around table face down.
child goes on floor with meerkat and puts meerkat under couch.
child pushes meerkat into mom's face and mom laughs.
child makes meerkat eat out of mom's hand.
child makes noises as he makes meerkat jump up and down on table.
child talks for meerkat.
child makes slurping noise as he makes meerkat drink out of mom's hand.
child places meerkat on table.
child stands meerkat on table.
mom and child pet meerkat and then child starts hitting meerkat.
meerkat falls on floor and then child picks it up and hugs it.
